content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am interested in renting this apartment. However, I am on a tight budget. Therefore, I would like to propose a rental price of 500 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that price is far below my expectations. My apartment is in high demand due to its location and amenities. I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. How about we start at 800 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view. However, I believe that 800 euros per month is too high for me. As a student, I have a limited budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of 650 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 650 euros is still below my asking price, but I'm willing to negotiate. Since you're a student, I can offer you a special rate of 750 euros per month if you sign a one-year lease. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a reasonable offer. However, I still believe that 750 euros per month is too high for me. As a student, I need to keep my expenses as low as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of 680 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 680 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. Let's meet in the middle. How about 720 euros per month with a one-year lease? This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. I am prepared to sign a one-year lease. Therefore, I am willing to accept your offer of 720 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Haoyu. I agree to the price of 720 euros per month! Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great. I am ready to sign the lease. I am looking forward to moving to your apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Wonderful, Haoyu. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in my apartment. Please come by my office to sign the lease and pay the deposit. We'll also need to discuss the terms of the agreement, such as the payment schedule and any additional fees.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your cooperation, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to signing the lease with you. Is there anything else we need to discuss before signing the lease?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Before we sign the lease, we should discuss the terms of the agreement in detail. We'll need to cover the payment schedule, any additional fees, and the terms of the lease itself. I'll have all the necessary paperwork ready for you at my office. Please let me know when you can come by to finalize everything.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for clarifying that, Mr. Schmidt. I can come by your office tomorrow at 10 am. I look forward to signing the lease and moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Haoyu. I'll see you tomorrow at 10 am. Bring along any documents you may need for the lease signing, such as your ID and proof of income. We'll go over everything thoroughly and make sure you're comfortable with all the terms before you sign. See you then!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I will bring all the necessary documents. Looking forward to seeing you tomorrow at 10 am.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
